common_2050_top_01: So this is the dorm room where you live.[VAR 0114(0011)]
common_2050_top_02:
I wonder, is this room what helped nurture your
potential as a Champion?[VAR 0114(0011)]
common_2050_top_03:
Ah, wait, I remember now. You only recently
moved into the dormitories.[VAR 0114(0011)]
common_2050_top_04:
In the near future, perhaps I’ll pay your family’s
home a visit, if I may...[VAR 0114(0011)]
common_2050_top_05: Anyway, let us get to the topic at hand.[VAR 0114(0011)]
common_2050_top_06:
I would very much like to hear your report now
that you’ve inspected the Gym Leaders.[VAR 0114(0011)]
common_2050_top_07:
Tell me... Which Gym Leader did you feel was
the easiest to face in battle?[VAR 0114(0011)]
common_2050_top_08:
Next, which Gym Leader left the strongest
impression on you?[VAR 0114(0011)]
common_2050_top_09:
Then...which Gym Leader gave you the most
trouble during battle?[VAR 0114(0011)]
common_2050_top_10: Next is the last, most important question.[VAR 0114(0011)]
common_2050_top_11: Which Gym Leader did you like the most?[VAR 0114(0011)]
common_2050_top_12:
Those are all the questions I have. Thank you
very much for your help on this.[VAR 0114(0011)]
common_2050_top_13:
[VAR BD06(0000)]Your perspective was fascinating,
Champion [VAR TRNAME(0000)].[VAR 0114(0011)]
common_2050_top_14:
I have no doubt it will assist me when running
the organization. Please accept this as thanks.[VAR 0114(0011)]
common_2050_top_15:
Thanks to you, my schedule has cleared up
quite significantly...[VAR 0114(0011)]
common_2050_top_16:
So I will most definitely be joining the
tournament we discussed in the director’s office.[VAR 0114(0011)]
common_2050_top_17: I’m sure Champion Nemona will be pleased, too.[VAR 0114(0011)]
common_2050_top_18:
Well, thanks for letting me visit. I should get
back to work now.[VAR 0114(0011)]
common_2050_top_19:
You must be tired. I suggest you take it easy
for the rest of the day.[VAR 0114(0011)]
common_2050_answer_08: Tulip... I would have to agree.[VAR 0114(0011)]
